name: Keep Your Sanity
description:
Keep Your Sanity is a 2D horror-shooter where you need to look out for you flashlight battery level and... your sanity. Guilt is taking over you bringing hallucinations. Will they be too real to bear?

 Controls
- Movement - WSAD
- Aim and shoot - Mouse
- 1, 2, 3 - Swap Weapon (if collected)
